interactivity.requirements: Thursday You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Horses or the Whispers of the Dead "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Yasu in the School Dorms ' second floor hallway for the first time.

progression.synopsis: Yasu is standing in the middle of the hall. She says if they talk too loudly about certain things, the floor will open up and swallow them, as happened to her previous school. She talks about opening his eyes, being cleansed of filth, the funny thing about morals, and her ability to swallow all sort of horrible things (the latter prompting an interjection from Kirin ). Finally, she invites Sensei to a sanctuary where God does not live, but very much likes to visit. He deduces this to mean a church, and reluctantly agrees to see Yasu there sometime.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .16p2.
